typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		RH_Level_1 as string,
		RH_Level_2 as string,
		RH_Level_3 as string,
		RH_Level_4 as string,
		RH_Level_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string,
		RH_Level_1 as string,
		RH_Level_2 as string,
		RH_Level_3 as string,
		RH_Level_4 as string,
		RH_Level_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT [Asset_ID]\n	,[Asset_Name]\n	,[Asset_Curency]\n	,[Fund_ID]\n	,[Asset_Alloc_Per]\n	,[Asset_country]\n	,[Fund_Region]\n	,[Fund_State]\n	,[Prop_Mgr_Name]\n	,[Prop_Mgr_Company]\n    ,[start_datetime]\n	,[process_name]\n	,[RH_Level_1]\n	,[RH_Level_2]\n	,[RH_Level_3]\n	,[RH_Level_4]\n	,[RH_Level_5]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Asset_Name,Asset_Curency,Fund_ID,Asset_Alloc_Per,Asset_country,Fund_Region,Fund_State,Prop_Mgr_Name,Prop_Mgr_Company,RH_Level_1,RH_Level_2,RH_Level_3,RH_Level_4,RH_Level_5)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Asset_Name,Asset_Curency,Fund_ID,Asset_Alloc_Per,Asset_country,Fund_Region,Fund_State,Prop_Mgr_Name,Prop_Mgr_Company,RH_Level_1,RH_Level_2,RH_Level_3,RH_Level_4,RH_Level_5)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum || Asset_Alloc_Per != Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Asset_Name = Asset_Name,
		Relation_Asset_Curency = Asset_Curency,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per = Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Relation_Asset_country = Asset_country,
		Relation_Fund_Region = Fund_Region,
		Relation_Fund_State = Fund_State,
		Relation_Prop_Mgr_Name = Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Relation_Prop_Mgr_Company = Prop_Mgr_Company,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RH_Level_1 = RH_Level_1,
		Relation_RH_Level_2 = RH_Level_2,
		Relation_RH_Level_3 = RH_Level_3,
		Relation_RH_Level_4 = RH_Level_4,
		Relation_RH_Level_5 = RH_Level_5,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		RH_Level_1,
		RH_Level_2,
		RH_Level_3,
		RH_Level_4,
		RH_Level_5
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		RH_Level_1,
		RH_Level_2,
		RH_Level_3,
		RH_Level_4,
		RH_Level_5
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name = Relation_Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency = Relation_Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per = Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country = Relation_Asset_country,
		Fund_Region = Relation_Fund_Region,
		Fund_State = Relation_Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name = Relation_Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company = Relation_Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		RH_Level_1 = Relation_RH_Level_1,
		RH_Level_2 = Relation_RH_Level_2,
		RH_Level_3 = Relation_RH_Level_3,
		RH_Level_4 = Relation_RH_Level_4,
		RH_Level_5 = Relation_RH_Level_5
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		RH_Level_1 as string,
		RH_Level_2 as string,
		RH_Level_3 as string,
		RH_Level_4 as string,
		RH_Level_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','process_name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		RH_Level_1,
		RH_Level_2,
		RH_Level_3,
		RH_Level_4,
		RH_Level_5
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage as decimal(18,2),
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage as decimal(18,2),
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Company_Name]\n      ,[Fund_Name]\n      ,[Fund_Master]\n      ,[Fund_master_Name]\n      ,[Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage]\n      ,[Fund_ABN]\n      ,[Fund_ARSN]\n      ,[Fund_Country]\n      ,[Fund_Region]\n      ,[Fund_State]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Fund]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Company_Name,Fund_Name,Fund_Master,Fund_master_Name,Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,Fund_ABN,Fund_ARSN,Fund_Country,Fund_Region,Fund_State)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Company_Name,Fund_Name,Fund_Master,Fund_master_Name,Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,Fund_ABN,Fund_ARSN,Fund_Country,Fund_Region,Fund_State)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum || Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage != Relation_Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Company_Name = Company_Name,
		Relation_Fund_Name = Fund_Name,
		Relation_Fund_Master = Fund_Master,
		Relation_Fund_master_Name = Fund_master_Name,
		Relation_Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage = Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Relation_Fund_ABN = Fund_ABN,
		Relation_Fund_ARSN = Fund_ARSN,
		Relation_Fund_Country = Fund_Country,
		Relation_Fund_Region = Fund_Region,
		Relation_Fund_State = Fund_State,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_', $ProcessName, $FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Company_Name = Relation_Company_Name,
		Fund_Name = Relation_Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master = Relation_Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name = Relation_Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage = Relation_Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Fund_ABN = Relation_Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN = Relation_Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country = Relation_Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region = Relation_Fund_Region,
		Fund_State = Relation_Fund_State,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage as decimal(18,2),
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID','process_name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow
